pullRequest.title: ah-6766-NPE
pullRequest.bodyText: revert code back to previous code that did not throw NPE. Add 2 unit tests to guard against this.

commit.message: revert code back to previous code that did not throw NPE. Add 2 unit tests to guard against this.

nodes.bodyText: Since you are reverting this method back to a version that handles nulls, I think you should remove the perAlleleValues.values().removeIf(Objects::isNull); line you added to computeSBAnnotation() above as well, for consistency with the pre-bug behavior.
Give the test a more specific name: testCombineRawDataNullPointerExceptionIssue6766()
Can you confirm that with the previous version of the StrandBiasUtils methods we do get a NullPointerException here?
Give this one a more specific name too: testMakeRawAnnotationStringsNullPointerExceptionIssue6766()
Same question here: did the NullPointerException get triggered with the previous version of StrandBiasUtils?
